name: Sadmin Night
description:
I DID NOT make this is simply page so more people can access this game from more countries.

Here's the links to the original game.

Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/879141

Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/sadmin_night/786429

A FNAF fangame where Sadmin tries to kill you or something.

Yeah, this idea came around when I swore to myself to finish Crossing the Pit Remastered before any other project, which I honestly don't regret. This game was a lot of fun to create as it wasn't something we needed to take seriously, which I think is where most of the joy of creating games comes from. I'm very grateful to be put in a position where I can do what I love doing most, which is creating games, and I'm glad to have met so many talented people along the way, like   @Arguswastaken 

who composed the soundtrack for this game alongside suggesting some neat ideas. A lot of things in this game wouldn't even exist without Argus so you also have him to thank for helping me push out this game to you guys. Oh and @Kejayco 

for making the Sadmin emoji otherwise this would've just been called Five Nights at Henry's or something.

Thank you PuffballsUnited for making the Henry Stickmin games, I wouldn't be where I am without them.

Anyway yeah spooky sadmin game go play now you sissy.

Windows notes:

Windows might tell you that it's by an unknown publisher. press more info then press run anyway to play it.

macOS notes:

Ignore Gatekeeper warnings by opening Finder > Navigating to the application > Right click > Open > Open.

#fnaf #henrystickmin #fangame #horror #action #survival #pointnclick #strategy
